channel.title: [PI]Fishing Help Pl0x (REP++)
channel.description:
Ok,
So I am adding fishing to my Project Insanity Source and I need some help.
I have a method for stopping fishing
[code=Java] public void resetFishing() {[/code]
And i need to make it so that it will execute that method when the player does an action (i.e. walks somewhere, opens an interface, teleports somewhere, etc, etc)
Is there an easy way to do this?
Because as of right now,
Once you start fishing, You don't stop until your inventory is full, no matter what else you do.

item.title: [PI]Fishing Help Pl0x (REP++)
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Give it a timer, and an integer when clicked.

Then process the animation for that many seconds.[/quote]
Not sure exactly what you mean,

I tried making one similar to the Woodcutting one, but its not working

Read full topic
